ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons KRAFT Light Zesty Italian Dressing
1 ½ pounds boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch chunks
1 ½ cups cut-up fresh asparagus (1-inch lengths)
4 ounces PHILADELPHIA 1/3 Less Fat Cream Cheese, cubed
¼ cup KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese

cookingTips: Toss chicken with dressing before cooking to flavor it throughout and prevent sticking
Add vegetables in stages based on their cooking time to ensure even tenderness
Cube the cream cheese and add it off heat, stirring gently to incorporate smoothly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through making a lighter, fresher pasta primavera with reduced-fat cream cheese. Emphasize proper vegetable prep and cooking times for a colorful, nutritious dish.
